title: AI support copilot that cut response times by 47%
heroTitle: Reducing support response time with an AI copilot inside their helpdesk
snippet: We designed and deployed a custom support copilot that drafts responses, surfaces relevant docs, and suggests next best actions inside the existing helpdesk.
challenge: Support agents were wasting time searching docs, rewriting messages and waiting for manager approvals — slowing customer responses to an average of 2.4 hours.
solution: We built an AI copilot that drafts replies, pulls customer conversation history, suggests shortcuts, and recommends docs. Everything runs inside their existing CRM workflow.
impact: Response time dropped by 47%, accuracy improved and customer satisfaction increased without hiring more support agents.

testimonial.name: Head of Support
testimonial.quote: This changed how our team works. We reply faster, more confidently and customer satisfaction has never been higher.

imageAlt: Dashboard view of AI copilot assisting support team

title: Automated product workflows across 4 internal tools
heroTitle: Automating product operations for a multichannel retailer
snippet: We built agents that sync inventory, generate product copy, and alert ops when anomalies are detected across sales channels.
challenge: Managing stock, updating descriptions and syncing listings across platforms required manual effort and constant spreadsheet updates.
solution: We deployed automations that sync inventory, detect anomalies and push updates across channels like Shopify, Amazon and internal ERP.
impact: Ops reclaimed 22+ hours per week, listings became consistent, and launch cycles moved much faster.

testimonial.name: Ops Manager
testimonial.quote: We got back an entire day every week. The workflows pay for themselves.

title: Executive AI dashboard for real-time portfolio insights
heroTitle: Helping leaders ask questions in natural language and get answers instantly
snippet: We created an AI-assisted analytics layer that lets leaders ask questions like "What's our most profitable segment?"
challenge: Executives were waiting on analysts for insights, spending hours building manual reports.
solution: We built an AI dashboard that lets leaders query the data in natural language and get summaries, insights and charts.
impact: The leadership team can make decisions 3x faster with no reporting bottleneck.

testimonial.name: Director of Analytics
testimonial.quote: It’s like having a data analyst available 24/7.

meta: From brief to v1 in 8 weeks
imageAlt: Finance dashboard with charts and metrics
